diff_summary:
Documentation and frontend-only updates:

- Updated API documentation for v2 endpoints
- Fixed typos in getting-started guide
- Added new code examples for authentication
- Updated copyright year in footer
- Improved mobile navigation styling

No backend changes.
No database changes.
No configuration changes.

- docs/api/v2-endpoints.md (+120, -45)
- docs/getting-started.md (+5, -5)

description: Routine documentation update with minor frontend styling fixes. No operational impact expected.
